overview:
Biju G.T : Business Continuity Specialist at http://www.linuxclub.org

Biju is the founder of Linux Club.He is heading our Club Activities to promote Open Source and creating new techno-business relations.He is always busy with club activities and Ham Radio. A solution provider to Technology Officer’s, IT Directors and IT Managers to solve complex technology issues directly or through his co-owners or partner companies. He is always trying to add value by creating the best solutions at the most cost effective price.

Linux Club’s clients and core-tech group have commented on how surprised and amazed they were at the solutions that he designed and custom tailored to their budgets. Most of them could not believe what could be accomplished, at the quality of service furnished, within their current budget using our solutions.
